articles.title: Coronavirus: California breaks cases record again as deadliest stretch continues - The Mercury News
articles.description: California counties collectively reported 54,532 new cases on Friday, topping by nearly 3,000 its previous single-day record set just a day earlier on Thursday.

articles.title: Staff shortages, extended lockdowns in coronavirus-ridden Colorado prisons create “tenuous” situations - The Denver Post
